entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this morning. 30 percent chance of light snow with risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 17 January 2023
